locker.title: Password entered incorrectly 3 times
locker.desc1: You have entered the wrong password 3 times. The system will temporarily suspend your account.
locker.desc2: You can regain access by resetting your password via the link sent to your email.
locker.desc1Pincode: You have entered the verification code incorrectly 5 times. The system will temporarily suspend your account.
locker.desc2Pincode: Please wait for Admin to contact you via Email.

auth.registerSubtitle: Create a new account to get started
auth.welcomeMessage: Welcome to DKSH Product Management System
auth.forgotPasswordMessage: Forgot password feature will be available soon
auth.verifyError: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
auth.otpWrong: The verification code is incorrect. Please try again.
auth.failModalDesc1: You have entered the wrong password 2 times.
auth.failModalDesc2: If you enter it incorrectly 3 times, the system will temporarily suspend your account.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
